full_text:
Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318-059 Date: 07.23.19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
8:37am Inmate Epstein is pajamaed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting at edge of bunk. Correctional Officer says he feels hungy (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
* 8:54am Inmate Epstein says he feels the lieutenant was less...the drinkwater - looking out the window (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:00am Inmate Epstein is pajamaed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:10AM Dr. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:15am is still speaking with (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:30am Inmate Epstein is sitting on edge of his bed. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:39am Inmate Epstein asked for the time (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
9:45am Inmate Epstein is sitting on the edge of his bed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
10:00 Inmate Epstein asked to speak with his attorney Inmate Epstein is using the bathroom (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
10:15am Inmate Epstein is speaking with Officer about his attorney (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
10:16am Inmate Epstein mentioned to be that Dr. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) said his attorney is not here yet (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
* 10:30am Inmate Epstein is drinking water
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
2

additional_notes: The document is a Suicide Watch Observation Log for inmate Epstein. The log contains handwritten observations at various times on July 23, 2019. Some of the entries are initialed with redacted names. The document is in fair condition with some handwritten notes and redactions.
